name: Let's play a game (itch)
description:
Try to stay alive until the end of the game
In this game you always lose
Playing the game well will not help you
You will not play well not help you
You're just a toy  in this  game
So try at least to pleasure the game

Contrl
  • arrow+mouse
  • rightShift - use Objects
  • Esc - close or open menu
Windows
    • Windows 7 or higher
    • 3.0 GHz Dual or higher processor
    • 1 GB available hard drive space
    • 4 GB RAM
    • nVidia GeForce GT x30
